meanings.sent1: Reaching the summae of the mountain was a challenging but rewarding experience.

meanings.sent1: The teacher provided a detailed summae of the lesson for the students to review.

meanings.definition: A collection of money gathered for a specific purpose
meanings.sent1: The charity event raised a large summae to support the local community.
meanings.sent2: The summae collected during the fundraiser would go towards building a new school.
meanings.sent3: She kept a small summae in her piggy bank for buying a special toy.
